predicate.note: Frames file for 'puzzle' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison with 'surprise' and 'confuse'.

example.name: passive
example.text: Takeover stock traders were puzzled *trace* by the Reliance filing.

example.name: passive
example.text: ``Communism will reach its final stage of development in a feckless Russo-corporation -- socialist in form, nationalistic in content and Oriental in style -- that [*T*-1] will puzzle the world with alternating feats of realism and recklessness...''
example.arg: [*] alternating feats of realism and recklessness
